samples.question: Why do people help each other?
samples.transcript: Well, people help each other out of empathy and compassion. many feel a moral obligation to actually assist those in need as it strengthens community bonds and you know fosters a sense of belonging I think and do you think people nowadays are less willing to help others compared to the past well less willing well I can say I do not think people are less willing to help today you know while modern life can be fast-paced many actively engage in charitable activities you know often using social media to mobilize support for various causes. I think all right and should schools teach students the importance of helping others the importance of helping others in the schools. Well, yes. you know, schools should actually teach the importance of helping others. You know, instilling values of empathy and you know, social responsibility helps shape actually compassionate individuals and you know creates a more caring society I believe.

You know, instilling values of uh empathy and you know, social responsibility uh helps shape uh actually compassionate uh individuals and you know creates a more caring society I believe.

I think all right and should schools teach students the importance of helping others the importance of helping others in the schools. Well, yes. you know, schools should actually teach the importance of helping others. You know, instilling values of empathy and you know, social responsibility helps shape actually compassionate individuals and you know creates a more caring society I believe.

samples.question: How many languages do you speak?
